metadata.name: Prologue Visual Album #1/100
metadata.description:
Prologue is the first interactive, visual album in Dolby Atmos to release as a digital collectible in web3. Collecting unlocks utilities and an immersive experience.

The visual album is a short film set to the music of Prologue.  The story is about a heartbroken novelist who descends into madness while writing a murder mystery on a vintage typewriter during a writing retreat. What started as a hit of inspiration spirals into obsession and confusion. Where is this story really going? And is she really who she thinks she is? The listener and viewer will be part of the mystery as you watch for clues which you will use to unlock 5 levels of the experience.

Tokens in this digital collection, give you access to the first level of the experience.  By unlocking this visual album's interactive experience, you will not only get to watch the short film set to my music while listening in Dolby Atmos but also be able to engage with the visuals through a series of gamified challenges that will include puzzles hidden in the video.  As you play through the experience, you will collect more digital collectibles at each level which will unlock the next level. 

Minting this token will unlock and start the experience at https://felicelazae.xyz/unlock-prologue.
